channel.title: ERIGrid 2.0 Test Cases – Test Specification 4.01
channel.description: Recent content in Test Specification 4.01 on ERIGrid 2.0 Test Cases

item.title: Docs: Experiment Specification 4.01.01
item.description:
Research Infrastructure

Electric Energy Systems Laboratory (ICCS-NTUA) 

Experiment Realisation

Multiple inverters forming a microgrid, both through hardware setup and through simulated components in the RTDS

Experiment Setup

  1. Hardware controller (e.g., Three-phase real-time computer)
  2. Simulated microgrid network and inverters in the RTDS
  3. Optional: Hardware inverter (e.g., Three-phase inverter)

Experimental Design and Justification

Precision of equipment and measurement uncertainty

Software and power analyzer are of high precision, inverter sensing system may be of lower precision

Storage of experiment data

Power analyzer and computer memory
